alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Central Orangeburg; Edgefield; Lexington; Northwestern Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 20 at 5:49PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Calhoun, central Edgefield, southern Lexington, northern Aiken, northwestern Orangeburg and southeastern Richland Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 548 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from South Congaree to near Edgefield. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... South Congaree, Pine Ridge, St. Matthews, Gaston, Congaree National Park, Edgefield County Airport, SC State Farmer`s Market, Sandy Run, Aiken Municipal Airport, Aiken State Park, Swansea, Wagener, North, Pelion, Springfield, Salley, Neeses, Perry, Trenton, and Woodford. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 14 and 43. Interstate 26 between mile markers 118 and 145. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Central Orangeburg; Edgefield; Lexington; Northwestern Orangeburg
